channel.title: Easier way to post journal to chat
channel.description: There should be a button in the journal that will post highlighted text to the chat box. I find I can spend too much time copy/pasting logs, then figuring out where it cut off so I can copy/paste the rest when every second is valuable during a vote. Also it becomes unclear in the chat where the nights in logs start and end so it would be nice if it would maintain the same formatting as the journal. While trying to make an informed decision on a vote, my brain spends way too much energy trying to parse poorly formatted logs.

item.title: Easier way to post journal to chat
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
1. copy all of the logs
  2. paste
  3. look at the nights, find the last one in chat, highlight that night and all forward
  4. paste

simple
